name: Sonar 2 - Polluted Cavern
description:
Explore a vast 'maze' of handmade underwater tunnels with nothing but your sonar to guide you.

Collect pollution and garbage.

Avoid dangerous wildlife that listens for your presence.

Reach the end to restart with new rules and systems.

Programming - Andrew Roulst

Art - Casey Gorsuch

Epilepsy Warning - This game may contain flashing lights and images that could cause discomfort or seizures.
